name: Gen 7 Cloud/Luckystripe/Himaly
bio: Shalom! My name's Gen 7 Cloud/Luckystripe/Himaly. I once peed on Mother Theresa's cat. They had it coming. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their clutches and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. I can't wait to wake you up at 4am for seemingly no reason.
